basics.name: Giordano Cicchetti
basics.summary: Ph.D. Candidate in Multimodal AI with expertise in machine learning and deep learning. Specialized in multimodal representation learning and alignment, and deep knowledge of multimodal generative AI. Proven track record in collaborative research environments and leadership in innovative projects.

work.name: Enel Global Services S.r.l.
work.summary: Developed a Generative AI-based pipeline to restore original quality of dirty documents, improving OCR performance. Implemented AI solutions using AE, GAN, and Diffusion Models, with the best model being NAF-DPM.
highlights: AWS services including Lambda, S3, and SageMaker
